mapper.select: SELECT leave_id, user_id, leave_type, start_date, end_date, leave_reason, status, approval_user FROM oas_leave_application
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oas_leave_application (user_id, leave_type, start_date, end_date, leave_reason, status, approval_user) VALUES (#{userId}, #{leaveType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{leaveReason}, #{status}, #{approvalUser})
mapper.update: UPDATE oas_leave_application SET user_id = #{userId}, leave_type = #{leaveType}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, leave_reason = #{leaveReason}, status = #{status}, approval_user = #{approvalUser} WHERE leave_id = #{leaveId}
